text: Émile Roumer Émile Roumer (5 February 1903 - April 1988) was a Haitian poet.HASENET - Haitian / American Sports and Education Network Roumer wrote mostly satirical poems and poems dealing with love and nature. Born in Jérémie, he was educated in France before studying business in Manchester, England. ==Bibliography== * Poèmes d'Haïti et de France (1925) * Poèmes en Vers (1947) * Le Caïman Etoilé (1963) * Rosaire Couronne Sonnets (1964) ==Death== Roumer died in Frankfurt, Germany in April 1988. ==References== ==Notes== * Category:1903 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Haitian male poets Category:20th-century Haitian poets Category:20th-century male writers
title: Émile Roumer
